prompts: Suppose you are a user of a dialog system or conversational agent. List 6 different user demographics, i.e. different age groups and genders, for movie queries to the dialog system. Some examples are [family-friendly, age-friendly, young, older].

Suppose you are a user of a dialog system or conversational agent. List 6 different user demographics, i.e. different age groups and genders, for movie queries to the dialog system. Some examples are [age-friendly, young, family-friendly, older].
